review:
Hi to all lovely mothers-to-be. We are elated and excited to share with you the birth of our baby boy on 12th Feb, our bundle of joy🤩🤩🤩

The journey for the last 9 months has been the most beautiful experience of my life. In the first week itself, we could feel that we might have conceived. Since we live outside India so we straight away went to Doctor and the doctor confirmed to us that we were pregnant. Because of covid-19 issues, our families were not able to join us there so we from the start had planned the birth of our child In New Delhi. The pregnancy went well for five and half months when I traveled back to Delhi. By then I had checked with friends and thoroughly googled the best pregnancy doctor in Delhi. 


I met Dr. Neha Khandelwal in my 26th month and with the first visit, I felt the relief that we have come to the right place. Dr. Neha guided us in every possible way, the transition from one doctor to another was smooth and during this whole time, I didn’t have any anxious moments.


We followed Dr. Neha’s each and every instruction religiously and till the approach of the ninth month, everything went smooth. On my 35th week, I developed symptoms of cough and fever, as suspected I tested positive for covid-19. I immediately contacted Dr. Neha. She reassured me that everything is going to be fine with instructions on how to take care of pregnancy with covid. A couple of days were stressful and everyone at home looked anxious. By God’s grace, my fever disappeared on 2nd day itself and it felt like a great relief. It took me 3-4 days more to completely recover and by the 5th day I felt completely fine.😊😊😊


We visited Doctor in the 37th Week and Dr. Neha told me to prepare the baby and body for the birth. Dr. Neha’s instructions regarding diet and exercises were very effective. Even though the target date for going into labor was 23rd Feb, my water broke on 11th Feb. We called Dr. Neha and Dr instructed us to come to the hospital immediately. By the time I reached the hospital, I started feeling contractions. Soon I found Dr. Neha by my bedside and in the next 4 hours, I was having full-blown contractions. We from the start planned for normal delivery so Dr Neha prepared me and the hospital staff accordingly. So finally the time came and every person in the labor room was so encouraging and set to have the baby delivered normally. I pushed hard and we dr could see the head of baby. In next one hour, we tried our best to deliver the baby normally, but since baby’s shoulders were not coming out so Dr. Neha took the call to go ahead for C–section. I was transferred to OT and a little past after midnight, our sunshine was out in this world.🥳🥳🥳🥳

On the morning of 12th Feb we had a minor issue, we called Dr. Neha and found her again by my bedside in 30 minutes. It was amusing to see her so much concerned about our health and comfort. Dr. Neha’s instructions are so clear and backed with complete information that it doesn’t leave a shred of doubt in your mind. Now I can hold my baby in my hands and forget the rest of the world, and no words can explain that feeling.😍😍😍😍
 
I wish you all happy and healthy pregnancy. Consider yourself lucky to be able to experience this journey. Special thanks to Dr. Neha Khandelwal, An Amazing Doctor, and such a wonderful human being.
